query:
query ($var0:String!) {
		participantconnection {
			edges {
				node {
					_id,
					anc_triager,
					authentication_service,
					bio,
					created_at,
					demo_hacker,
					disabled,
					email,
					hackerone_triager,
					i_can_update_username,
					id,
					impact,
					impact_percentile,
					invitation_preference,
					location,
					member_of_verified_team,
					name,
					next_update_username_date,
					otp_backup_codes,
					profile_picture(size:small),
					rank,
					reputation,
					signal,
					signal_percentile,
					totp_enabled,
					totp_supported,
					triage_user,
					tshirt_size,
					unconfirmed_email,
					url,
					username,
					website,
				},
				rank,
				reputation,
			},
			total_count,
			year_range,
		}
	}
